text: The 1987 Big Eight Men's Basketball Tournament was held March 6–8 at Kemper Arena in Kansas City, Missouri. Top-seeded defeated #2 seed Kansas in the championship game, 67–65, to earn the conference's automatic bid to the 1987 NCAA Tournament. ==Bracket== ==References== Tournament Category:Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1987 Big Eight Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
